column4: How long should it take to create an ext3 partition on a 1.5TB disk with gparted?
it highly depends on your system
approximately? I have a core2duo 3.0ghz, the hard disk is a sata wd green 1.5tb
it also depends on your ram... on the usage of your disk.. but it will take long
the disk is new, so no usage, I have 4gb ram, on ubuntu 64bit. Am I looking at 20 minutes, 1 hour, 7 hours?
